column1: The '''Council of the Sceptre''' were the nobles and lords of from each of the [[Númenor#Geography|six regions]] of [[Númenor]]
column3: who gathered to advise the King on weighty matters of state.<ref>{{UT|Wife}}
column4: Note 23</ref> In the early days of Númenor
column5: the Councillors had no power save that of advice
column6: but when the [[Shadow]] fell upon Númenor and the Kings clung to their lives even after their vigor of mind had left them
column7: their power often passed to the members of the Council.
